sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_a694c8ff0f044300f59c47ace1050e59
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script><![CDATA[var SNtoGitAjax = new GlideAjax('SNtoGIT');
SNtoGitAjax.addParam('sysparm_name','pushToGIT');
SNtoGitAjax.addParam('sysparm_table',g_form.getTableName());
SNtoGitAjax.addParam('sysparm_sys_id',g_form.getUniqueValue());
SNtoGitAjax.getXMLWait();
var updateSetDetails = btoa(SNtoGitAjax.getAnswer());

var filePath = g_form.getValue('name') + '.xml';
var obj = {
	"message": "Commit from ServiceNow",
	"committer": {
		"name": "GuhanN",
		"email": "guhann1991@gmail.com"
	},
	"branch": "master",
	"content": updateSetDetails,
	"tree": "525656787163010b5020a19b6aa3ef6373ba68fc",
	"parent": {
		"sha": "525656787163010b5020a19b6aa3ef6373ba68fc"
	}
};
var requestBody = JSON.stringify(obj);
console.log(requestBody);
var client = new XMLHttpRequest();
client.open("PUT","https:api.github.com/repos/GuhanN/ServiceNow-Test/contents/"+filePath);
client.setRequestHeader('Accept','application/json');
client.setRequestHeader('Content-Type','application/json');
client.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'Basic '+btoa('guhann1991@gmail.com'+':'+'myPwd1@github'));
client.onreadystatechange = function() {
	if(this.readyState == this.DONE) {
		alert('response: '+this.status + ' ~ ' + this.response);
		//document.getElementById("response").innerHTML=this.status + this.response;
	}
};
client.send(requestBody);]]></client_script><description/><direct>false</direct><endpoint/><html><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<button onclick="pushToGIT()">Push to GIT</button>
</j:jelly>]]></html><name>Push2GIT</name><processing_script/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>guhann</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-25 18:17:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a694c8ff0f044300f59c47ace1050e59</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Push2GIT</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_page_a694c8ff0f044300f59c47ace1050e59</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>guhann</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-25 19:37:43</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4842b2e30f404300f59c47ace1050eb4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SNtoGIT</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SNtoGIT</name><script><![CDATA[var SNtoGIT = Class.create();
SNtoGIT.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	pushToGIT : function() {
		try {
			var table = this.getParameter('sysparm_table');
			var sysID = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
			var recordURL = "https://dev14427.service-now.com/"+table+".do?XML&useUnloadFormat=true&sysparm_query=sys_id="+sysID;
			var client = new GlideHTTPClient();
			var method =  new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.GetMethod(recordURL);
			var user = 'guhann';
			var password = 'S@chin10dulkar';
			client.setBasicAuth(user,password);
			var status = client.executeMethod(method);
			var recordXMLString = method.getResponseBodyAsString();
			gs.log('recordXMLString: '+recordXMLString,'git');
			return recordXMLString;
		}
		catch(e) {
			gs.log('Exception @ '+e.lineNumber + ', ' + e.message,'git');
		}
	},
	
	getXMLData : function(table,sysID) {
		try {
			var recordURL = "https://dev14427.service-now.com/"+table+".do?XML&useUnloadFormat=true&sysparm_query=sys_id="+sysID;
			var client = new GlideHTTPClient();
			var method =  new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.GetMethod(recordURL);
			var user = 'guhann';
			var password = 'S@chin10dulkar';
			client.setBasicAuth(user,password);
			var status = client.executeMethod(method);
			var recordXMLString = method.getResponseBodyAsString();
			gs.log('recordXMLString: '+recordXMLString,'git');
			return recordXMLString;
		}
		catch(e) {
			gs.log('Exception @ '+e.lineNumber + ', ' + e.message,'git');
		}
	},
	
	type: 'SNtoGIT'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>guhann</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-25 12:14:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4842b2e30f404300f59c47ace1050eb4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNtoGIT</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4842b2e30f404300f59c47ace1050eb4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>guhann</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-25 19:15:05</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
